bibl.title: Five Mummy Labels from the Hilton Price Collection.
bibl.note: A Catalogue of the Egyptian Antiquities in the Possession of F.G. Hilton Price (London, 1897), now accessible on the Internet, features five mummy labels. Three texts can be identified with published labels: No. 2126 = S.B. I, 4237; C.E.M.G. 1975; - No. 2127 = S.B. I, 4238; C.E.M.G. 2138; - No. 2127A = T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1271 (9393) [edd.: Sofía Torallas Tovar & Klaas A. Worp, New Wooden Labels from Various Collections, ZPE 184 (2013) pp. 262, No. 13]. Nos 2124 and 2125 seem to be still unpublished.
bibl.seg: 143.4 T. Coll. privées: T. Hilton Price Inv. 2124; 2125 145.4 C.E.M.G. 1975; 2138 T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1271 (9393)
K.A. Worp, Five Mummy Labels from the Hilton Price Collection.

A Catalogue of the Egyptian Antiquities in the Possession of F.G. Hilton Price (London, 1897), now accessible on the Internet, features five mummy labels. Three texts can be identified with published labels: No. 2126 = S.B. I, 4237; C.E.M.G. 1975; - No. 2127 = S.B. I, 4238; C.E.M.G. 2138; - No. 2127A = T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1271 (9393) [edd.: Sofía Torallas Tovar & Klaas A. Worp, New Wooden Labels from Various Collections, ZPE 184 (2013) pp. 262, No. 13]. Nos 2124 and 2125 seem to be still unpublished.
